verses.verse: Why <S%H4100><s%> are the nations <S%H1471><s%> in an uproar, <S%H7283><s%> And the peoples <S%H3816><s%> devising <S%H1897><s%> a vain <S%H7385><s%> thing <S%H7385><s%>?

The kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> take <S%H3320><s%> their stand, <S%H3320><s%> And the rulers <S%H7336><s%> take <S%H3245><s%> counsel <S%H3245><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> Against <S%H5921><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> His Anointed: <S%H4899><s%>
"Let us tear <S%H5423><s%> their fetters <S%H4147><s%> apart, <S%H5423><s%> And cast <S%H7993><s%> away <S%H7993><s%> their cords <S%H5688><s%> from us!"
He who sits <S%H3427><s%> in the heavens <S%H8064><s%> laughs, <S%H7832><s%> The Lord <S%H136><s%> scoffs <S%H3932><s%> at them.
Then <S%H227><s%> He will speak <S%H1696><s%> to them in His anger <S%H639><s%> And terrify <S%H926><s%> them in His fury: <S%H2740><s%>
"But as for Me, I have installed <S%H9332><s%> My King <S%H4428><s%> Upon Zion, <S%H6726><s%> My holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain. <S%H2022><s%>"

"I will surely <S%H3588><s%> tell <S%H5608><s%> of the decree <S%H2706><s%> of the Lord: <S%H3068><s%> He said <S%H559><s%> to Me, 'Thou art My Son, <S%H1121><s%> Today <S%H3117><s%> I have begotten <S%H3205><s%> Thee.

'Ask <S%H7592><s%> of Me, and I will surely give <S%H5414><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> as Thine inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> And the [very] ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> as Thy possession. <S%H272><s%>
'Thou shalt break <S%H9570><s%> them with a rod <S%H7626><s%> of iron, <S%H1270><s%> Thou shalt shatter <S%H5310><s%> them like earthenware. <S%H3627><s%> <S%H3335><s%>' "
Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, O kings, <S%H4428><s%> show <S%H7919><s%> discernment; <S%H7919><s%> Take <S%H3256><s%> warning, <S%H3256><s%> O judges <S%H8199><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
Worship <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> with reverence, <S%H3374><s%> And rejoice <S%H1523><s%> with trembling. <S%H9564><s%>

Do <S%H5401><s%> homage <S%H5401><s%> to the Son, <S%H1248><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> He become <S%H599><s%> angry, <S%H599><s%> and you perish [in] the way, <S%H6><s%> For His wrath <S%H1870><s%> may soon <S%H639><s%> be kindled. <S%H4592><s%> How blessed <S%H1197><s%> are all <S%H835><s%> who take <S%H3605><s%> refuge <S%H2620><s%> in Him!
